About Me

Graduated in 2019 from the University of Central Florida with a B.S. in Computer Science. Currently work at Walt Disney World in Orlando, FL.

Programming for the last 7 or so years, my strengths include JavaScript and Python, with interests in big data, UI design and programming with Angular, and machine learning.

For the past year and a half I have been making magic with Disney, mainly doing Python scripting and Angular development. In college, I worked on my senior design project, working with big data to create visualizations for soundscape ecology researchers (also on my repos page.)

Outside of programming, I'm a huge basketball fan, I play a variety of video games on PC and PlayStation, I'm really into board games, and I follow sumo wrestling religiously.

Just taking things one day at a time, learning as I go to try and be the best programmer and person I can be.
